Hi,


I have a question on JUnit versions I hope you can help or point me t=
o someone who can provide answers.
I would like to know the end of life and=
 end of regular support for versions 4.12 and 4.11.
Can we expect the versi=
ons mentioned to be around by 2022? Or we will have newer versions.
How oft=
en do we have a major version?


Your answers will help me in planning the =
usage/upgrades of this software.


Many thanks in advance,
Ardeshir.

--_000_DM2PR09MB03994C90036354B1D90CE4229E810DM2PR09MB0399namp_
